item.title: How Purchase $LUCID Token Instruction [VIDEO]
item.dc:creator: Academy
item.description:
Begin your journey by heading over to finance.lucidia.io. This is your gateway to the world of $LUCID tokens. On the top right corner of the page, you’ll see the Connect Wallet button. Give that a click and sign in with your preferred wallet. Whether you’re a MetaMask enthusiast or Trust Wallet lover, we’ve got you […]

The post How Purchase $LUCID Token Instruction [VIDEO] appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
Play Video
  1. Begin your journey by heading over to finance.lucidia.io. This is your gateway to the world of $LUCID tokens.
  2. On the top right corner of the page, you’ll see the Connect Wallet button. Give that a click and sign in with your preferred wallet. Whether you’re a MetaMask enthusiast or Trust Wallet lover, we’ve got you covered!
  3. Once you’re in, it’s time to make your move. Hit the BUY $LUCID button. Ready to dive into the world of cryptocurrency? Let’s do it!
  4. A pop-up window will appear. Here, you’ll need to choose the network you’ll be buying with. For this guide, we’re going with the Binance Smart Chain. But remember, it’s your choice!
  5. Now, it’s time to decide how many $LUCID tokens you want to purchase. Think big, dream bigger, and type that number in!
  6. Next, select your bonus. Just keep in mind that this bonus will be available one month after the Token Generation Event (TGE).
  7. Here comes a crucial step. You must select the token you plan to buy $LUCID with. You’ve got plenty of options, from ETH, USDT, BNB, USDC, BUSD, MATIC, DAI, to TUSD. And the best part? You can choose between ERC-20 and BEP-20 contracts. It’s all about flexibility and your comfort.
  8. Once you’ve made your selection, hit the Buy button. Follow up with your wallet’s notification window and let’s keep this ball rolling!
  9. Some wallet applications might ask you to re-enter the amount you’re planning to spend. Don’t worry, this is normal! Either type in the amount manually or use the default button to paste the same amount you entered on our dApp.
  10. Now, it’s time to Sign the transaction. This is your digital signature, verifying that it’s really you making the purchase.
  11. After signing, Approve the transaction. Just one more step to secure your $LUCID tokens!
  12. To spice things up, type in your Telegram username. This will grant you an additional 5% bonus for every user you refer to us. Who said there’s no such thing as a free lunch?
  13. Finally, copy your referral link from the bottom of the page. Congrats! You’re all set to start your $LUCID journey and share the excitement with your friends.

The post How Purchase $LUCID Token Instruction [VIDEO] appeared first on Lucidia.

item.title: How to whitelist your wallet address for Lucidia Presale [VIDEO]
item.dc:creator: Academy
item.description:

Whitelisting is an important step that allows you to participate in the presale and enjoy exclusive benefits. Follow these simple steps to get started: Visit Lucidia DeFi App (https://finance.lucidia.io)/ […]

The post How to whitelist your wallet address for Lucidia Presale [VIDEO] appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
Play Video

Are you new to whitelisting? Don’t worry! In this article, we’ll explain how you can easily whitelist your wallet for a presale at Lucidia Finance. Whitelisting is an important step that allows you to participate in the presale and enjoy exclusive benefits. Follow these simple steps to get started:

Visit Lucidia DeFi App (https://finance.lucidia.io)/ to get started

Step 1: Copy Your Wallet Address

The first thing you need to do is find your wallet address. This could be in your MetaMask or Trust Wallet, for example. Once you’ve located it, copy the wallet address to your clipboard.

Step 2: Paste Your Wallet Address


Go to the Lucidia Finance app and find the “Smart Wallet Address” field. Paste your wallet address here. This step ensures that your wallet is linked to the presale.

Step 3: Provide Investment Amount


Next, provide an approximate investment amount in USD. This helps Lucidia Finance understand your investment intentions and prepare for the presale accordingly.

Step 4: Enter Your Contact Information


Lucidia Finance requires some basic contact information from you. Provide your Telegram Username, which will be used later as your referral code.

Additionally, enter your Discord Username and your email address. This information is essential for communication and updates regarding the presale.


Step 5: Bonus Opportunity

If you want to receive a 20% bonus, you can enter the Telegram username of the person who referred you. Make sure the Telegram user is a valid member of Lucidia Finance’s Telegram channel.

Step 6: Review and Submit

Double-check that all the data you’ve entered is correct. Once you’re satisfied, click the “Submit” button. By doing this, you’re completing the whitelisting process.

Congratulations! You’re Whitelisted!

That’s it! You’ve successfully whitelisted your wallet for the Lucidia Finance presale. It’s as simple as that. Now, if you want to earn an additional 5% bonus, you can refer your friends using your unique referral code. Spread the word and invite others to join Lucidia Finance.

Thank you for joining Lucidia!

We appreciate your interest in Lucidia Finance. If you have any further questions or encounter any issues, please don’t hesitate to reach out to our help center at help.openai.com. We’re here to assist you.

Happy investing in Lucidia Finance! Visit us at Lucidia DeFi App (https://finance.lucidia.io)/ to get started.

The post How to whitelist your wallet address for Lucidia Presale [VIDEO] appeared first on Lucidia.
